title: Charlotte Trade Shows Boost Brand Visibility with Custom Tents
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte, NC, are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows, focusing on flexibility and impact.
charlotte_impact: Highlights innovative marketing strategies businesses are using to stand out in competitive trade show environments.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks VP of Business Development in Charlotte
summary: Mosaic Capital Partners, a Charlotte-based private equity firm, is seeking a Vice President of Business Development to expand employee ownership.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment in employee-owned businesses within the Charlotte area.

title: Florence Airport Sees Passenger Increase Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport experiences passenger growth in 2025 but loses American Airlines flight to Charlotte. Potential new flight to D.C. possible.
charlotte_impact: Shows the dynamics of regional air travel and the impact of airline decisions on local airports.

title: NC Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl
summary: Three women in North Carolina are charged with the child abuse death of Dominique Moody, who was allegedly tortured and kept in a dog crate in Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reports a horrific crime, raising concerns about child safety and the justice system.

title: Homeowners Reassessing Selling Time as Market Shifts
summary: Homeowners in Charlotte, NC, are reconsidering when to sell their homes due to changing market conditions, according to Travis Buys Home.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the evolving real estate market and its impact on homeowner decisions.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions, Expands Partnerships
summary: KPN Consulting Services in Charlotte, NC, facilitates $20M in acquisitions and expands economic development partnerships.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the role of consulting firms in driving economic growth and business expansion.

title: Search for Suspects After Deadly Crash in Salisbury
summary: Police are searching for suspects involved in a deadly crash in Salisbury where a car pulled out in front of motorcyclists.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the dangers of reckless driving and the ongoing efforts to bring those responsible to justice.

title: Homeland Security Suspends TSA PreCheck and Global Entry
summary: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security suspends TSA PreCheck and Global Entry programs due to a partial government shutdown.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates the impact of government shutdowns on travel and security programs.

title: Major Temperature Drop Expected

title: Restaurants Accused of Mislabelling Imported Shrimp
summary: Some South Carolina restaurants are accused of serving imported shrimp but labeling it as American wild-caught shrimp.
charlotte_impact: Raises concerns about food fraud and the misrepresentation of local seafood.

title: Nissan Recalls 600k Rogue SUVs Over Safety Risks
summary: Nissan is recalling 600,000 Rogue SUVs due to safety concerns that could endanger drivers and passengers.

title: Teen Charged with Murder in Rock Hill Shooting
summary: A 16-year-old girl has been charged with murder in connection to a deadly shooting at a parking garage in Rock Hill.
charlotte_impact: Reports a tragic incident of gun violence involving a minor.
